title: A superhydrophobic nanocrystalline MOF embedded starch@cotton composite for fast, selective and nanomolar sensing and adsorptive removal of a fluorinated herbicide from aqueous medium
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3599-3614
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00289J, Paper
Subhrajyoti Ghosh, Paltan Laha, Shyam Biswas
A reusable starch@cotton composite embedded with nanocrystalline MOF was fabricated, characterized, and applied for nanomolar recognition and adsorption of trifluralin from contaminated water, fruits, vegetables, soil, and diverse pH environments.
